verses.name: Isaiah 57:15
verses.text: For thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.

verses.name: Isaiah 57:16
verses.text: For I will not contend for ever, neither will I be always wroth: for the spirit should fail before me, and the souls which I have made.
